LanguageData.RawCotton.label: Raw Cotton
LanguageData.RawCotton.description: Raw Cotton from a Cotton Bush. It can be spun into Cloth at a Tailor's Workbench.
LanguageData.RawFlax.label: Raw flax
LanguageData.RawFlax.description: Raw flax. It can be spun into cloth or sold to a trader.
LanguageData.RawDevilstrand.label: Raw Devilstrand
LanguageData.RawDevilstrand.description: Raw Devilstrand from a Devilstrand Mushroom. It can be spun into Devilstrand Cloth at a Tailor's Workbench.
